name: Shadow-Weaving Power
text:
This Skill's second effect can only be used once per Duel if all of the monsters in your Deck (excluding the Extra Deck) are "Shaddoll" monsters or Spellcaster monsters. 
1: At the beginning of the Duel, choose 2 "Shaddoll" Trap Cards from your Deck at random and send them to the Graveyard, and add 1 "El Shaddoll Winda" to your Extra Deck, and 3 "Shaddoll Fusion" and 1 "Shaddoll Schism" to your Deck.
2: During your Main Phase, shuffle 1 "Shaddoll" card from your Graveyard or among your banished cards into the Deck.
